name: unreviewable
content:

An unreviewable decision or power cannot be questioned or considered again: This makes the governor's decision virtually unreviewable. Local officials hold largely unreviewable powers to issue business licences. Related word
review
More examplesFewer examplesThe order must be effectively unreviewable on appeal from a final judgment.It provides the United States attorney with unreviewable discretion to charge juveniles as adults.Under the old regime, sentencing discretion was essentially unreviewable. The Constitution gives the legislative branch unreviewable authority over removal decisions.
